love

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • love.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Card maintains all data and functionality relevant to an individual card in the game of Love Letter.
    Author:
    jpolonsky

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Returns:
        the point value of the card for determining the winner or result of other card effects

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns:
        the name of the card, for use in determining player strategies

      • getType

        public CardType getType()
        Returns:
        an object encapsulating the information about this paticular type of card

      • Play

        public Card Play(Deck currentDeck,
                 Player me,
                 Player target,
                 CardType guess)
        Handles the effects of the various cards
        Parameters:
        currentDeck - allows cards to interact with the deck and the discard pile
        me - the player whose turn it is
        target - if the card type requires a target, this is that player
        guess - for use with Guards
        Returns:
        this card
